about_the_game:
*Identical DLC is available for all games in the Fuga: Melodies of Steel series. Please be careful not to buy duplicates.

Volume 1 of the comicalized Fuga: Melodies of Steel!

Story:
Within the terrors of war—the children swear revenge.
The story takes place on a floating continent, an archipelago of both small and large floating islands where two species known as Caninu and Felineko live.
Malt, a young Caninu shepherd, lives with his little sister Mei in Petit Mona, a little village located in the Free Lands of Gasco. Over the course of a single night, the Berman Empire invades and throws the village into the flames of war.
Malt and his friends are plunged into confusion when a mysterious voice on the radio guides them to board the giant tank Taranis to save their families!

Artist:
Original Story: CyberConnect2
Manga: Takafumi Adachi
His representative works are D・MFighter Honoo, Metal Fight Beyblade, Ballet Hero Fantasy: Dan no bouken, and Anima Gear.

Specs: .pdf file, B6, Monochrome, 117 Pages
